name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts
display_help: A compilation of various fighting techniques from around the world, Martial Arts makes you a master in the art of hand to hand combat. Martial Artists tend to be very accurate with their strikes.

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Thunder_Kick
powers.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 7.15s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Storm_Kick
powers.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick boosts the Tanker's defense against melee, ranged and area of effect damage slightly for a short period of time after hitting their foe. This bonus defense doesn't stack with itself and is unenhanceable. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Self +Defense(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

display_info: 10.00% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 10s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Cobra_Strike
powers.display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals high damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 75.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 11.92s on target
75.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Warriors_Provocation
powers.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -100.00% strength to range for 20s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Crane_Kick
powers.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Dragons_Tail
powers.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

display_info: 75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Focus_Chi
powers.display_help: Tapping into your inner Chi greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Crippling_Axe_Kick
powers.display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals superior smashing damage, reduces the targets defense, may Immobilize, and Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 50.00% chance for 1.0 immobilize for 11.92s on target
50.00% chance for 2.0 immobilize for 2s on target
-40.00% run speed, jump speed for 8s on target
-40.00% strength to jump height for 8s on target
-7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Martial_Arts.Eagles_Claw
powers.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. After using Eagle's Claw your damage will be increased for a brief moment allowing the next attack or two to cause additional damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +DMG(All)

display_info: 33.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 3s on self after 2.5s delay
